go wrong.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Something’s gone wrong with my watch.
go wrong.translation[0].definitions[1].d: to make a mistake during a process so that you do not get the right result
go wrong.translation[0].definitions[1].e: Follow these instructions and you can’t go wrong (=you are sure to succeed).
go wrong.translation[0].definitions[2].d: to do something that makes a plan, relationship etc fail
go wrong.translation[0].definitions[2].e: Thinking back on the marriage, I just don’t know where we went wrong.
